Orphapacket.Label: Isolated absence of both lower leg and foot

Synonyms.Synonym: Isolated congenital tibiofibular terminal transverse meromelia

TextSection.Contents: Congenital absence of both lower leg and foot is a rare non-syndromic terminal transverse limb reduction defect characterized by unilateral or bilateral absence of both the tibia and the fibula as well as the distal elements composing the foot.
